attributes.action: demand that fuel prices to be frozen at the pumps with immediate effect and fuel duty to be cut by at least50%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: sunderland driving instructors(sadi) along with newcastle, gateshead, south tyneside, durham ,along with taxi drivers would like to see fuel prices frozen of immediate effect and fuel duty halved to bring back some sanity to this crazy situation and stabllize the economy bert moncur sadi chairman.

rejection.details: There are many similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=fuel+duty&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=audit+bank&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
